data.eml:eml: Holopothrips diversity-a Neotropical genus of gall-inducing insects (Thysanoptera, Phlaeothripidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lindner, Mariana F., Ferrari, Augusto, Mound, Laurence A., Cavalleri, Adriano (2018): Holopothrips diversity-a Neotropical genus of gall-inducing insects (Thysanoptera, Phlaeothripidae). Zootaxa 4494 (1): 1-99, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4494.1.1
